forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 43. South wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco greets us today with a clear and bright disposition, the kind of weather that encourages breath and reflection. As the sun bathes the city, temperatures hover comfortably, gradually dipping into the early afternoon. The northwest breeze whispers softly at three to seven miles per hour, adding a pleasant coolness to the air without intruding upon the warmth of the sun. 

This afternoon promises to remain free from the veil of fog that often dances along the coastline, revealing an unobstructed view of the iconic skyline, each detail crisp and vivid. With a low expected tonight around 43 degrees, one might consider a light jacket or a cozy sweater for when the daylight fades. As the evening approaches, the city invites you to stroll along the waterfront, perhaps to find a quiet café where the soundtrack of evening conversations blends with the gentle lapping of waves. Whether you're wandering the piers or stopping to admire the Golden Gate’s silhouette against the backdrop of dusk, today offers the kind of weather that makes even the ordinary feel exceptional.
